title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hamas Hideout in UNRWA School: Key Terrorists Eliminated”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a Hamas facility within a school in Nuzha; terrorists involved in the murderous massacre in the border communities on October 7 were eliminated.

A short while ago, fighter jets attacked, guided by the forces of Division 99, the Intelligence Corps, and the Shin Bet, a facility used by the Hamas terrorist organization located within a UNRWA school in the Nuzha area.

Hamas and PIJ terrorists who belonged to the Nukhba forces and participated in the murderous massacre in the border communities on October 7 were present at the facility.

The terrorists directed terror from the area of the school, using it as a civilian cover and a hideout. In the attack, terrorists who planned to carry out attacks and advance terror plots against our forces in the immediate timeframe were eliminated.

Before the attack, numerous measures were taken to minimize the likelihood of harming non-combatants. As part of those efforts, aerial intelligence checks were conducted, precision strikes were employed, and additional intelligence information was utilized.

An infographic of the school facility where the terrorists were located is attached: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC0606202467846503738756
